caption: This is an electronic music piece. There is a high-pitched synth and stabbing strings in the melodic structure. An occasional vocal sample can be heard adding a haunting texture. There is a loud electronic drum beat in the rhythmic background. The atmosphere is unnerving and filled with terror. This piece could be used in a horror movie or a horror video game.
